full_text: @trsimmons58 @BrunoHMioto Never mind, I tracked it down - from #nflverse docs "qb_epa is an nflfastR creation that is equal to EPA in all instances except for when a pass is completed and a fumble is lost, in which case a QB gets 'credit' for the play up to the spot the fumble was lost".
